    • execute

      public void execute(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context, Map<String,Object> scheduledContext) throws ExecutionException
      Description copied from interface: ScheduledService
      Invoked by the scheduler when the scheduler triggers.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface ScheduledService
      Parameters:
      context - the Context to use for the request
      scheduledContext - Context information passed by the scheduler service
      Throws:
      ExecutionException - if execution of the scheduled work failed. Implementations can also throw RuntimeExceptions which will get logged.

    • auditScheduledService

      Parameters:
      context - the context to use to audit the event

    • execScript

      public org.forgerock.json.JsonValue execScript(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context, org.forgerock.script.ScriptEntry script, Map<String,Object> bindings) throws org.forgerock.json.resource.ForbiddenException, org.forgerock.json.resource.InternalServerErrorException, org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException
      Executes the given script with the provided bindings.
      Specified by:
      execScript in interface ScriptExecutor
      Parameters:
      context - The request context
      script - The script
      bindings - The bindings
      Returns:
      JsonValue to be used for a given patch operation
      Throws:
      org.forgerock.json.resource.ForbiddenException - on script execution error
      org.forgerock.json.resource.InternalServerErrorException - on script execution error
      org.forgerock.json.resource.BadRequestException - on script null or inactive
